notes.p: During production of the article (December 2019â€“February 2020), mankind was faced with a sudden outbreak of acute respiratory illness (with significant mortality) caused by the SARS-CoV-2 enveloped coronavirus. Currently (28.02.20), COVID-19 has been recorded in many countries and is threatening to become a pandemic [21]. The unexpected emergence of the novel virus, and its rapid spread, further highlight the urgency of developing broad-spectrum antiviral therapies targeting the lipid bilayer of enveloped viruses.
